item.title: FAQ for Linode
item.description: I want to change my owncast domain name You need to add the new domain to the reverse proxy config in /etc/caddy/Caddyfile Connect via ssh to your server Edit the file via sudo nano /etc/caddy/Caddyfile It should look like this: your.old.domain { reverse_proxy 127.0.0.1:8080 encode gzip tls YOUR_EMAIL_ADDRESS } Change your.old.domain to your new domain name Save the file CTRL+s Close the editor CTRL+x Restart the reverse proxy systemctl restart caddy Wait up to a few minutes for your new certificate to be generated
